predicate.note: Frames file for 'alienate' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.1.

example.name: just transitive
example.text: With only two issues under its belt, Garbage has alienated some would-be advertisers and raised the ire of others.
example.arg: With only two issues under its belt

example.name: with instrument
example.text: They chance *trace* alienating the customers they hope to woo by looking like opportunistic sharks.
example.arg: the customers they hope to woo
